name: CCB Quiche Bites
preparation: Preheat oven to 325° F (160° C). Lightly oil a Perfect Petites and place on a Sheet Pan.
Whisk eggs, Parmesan, milk, and dip mix.
Divide red pepper into Perfect Petites and top with egg mix. Bake for 15–20 minutes, rotating baking sheet halfway through cooking time. Season to taste.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: A versatile non-stick silicone pan that makes baking the cutest bite-sized portions easy and fun! Go beyond baking and use the Perfect Petites to make ice cubes, portion baby food and sauces, and more!
